Uses of Package
io.bloombox.schema.comms

  • Packages that use io.bloombox.schema.comms 
    Package Description
    io.bloombox.schema.comms

  • Classes in io.bloombox.schema.comms used by io.bloombox.schema.comms 
    Class and Description
    CommsTask.AdEngineOperation
    Specifies a marketing engine operation, in which a campaign and a set of ad groups are matched to a user's profile, and enqueued for transmission if targeting parameters don't exclude their profile.
    CommsTask.AdEngineOperation.Builder
    Specifies a marketing engine operation, in which a campaign and a set of ad groups are matched to a user's profile, and enqueued for transmission if targeting parameters don't exclude their profile.
    CommsTask.AdEngineOperationOrBuilder 
    CommsTask.SendOperation
    Send a batch of either SMS or email messages.
    CommsTask.SendOperation.Builder
    Send a batch of either SMS or email messages.
    CommsTask.SendOperation.OperationCase 
    CommsTask.SendOperation.Status
    Statuses that a send operation may assume.
    CommsTask.SendOperationOrBuilder 
    CommsTask.TriggerOperation
    Specifies an operation to merge campaign targeting parameters and trigger execution.
    CommsTask.TriggerOperation.Builder
    Specifies an operation to merge campaign targeting parameters and trigger execution.
    CommsTask.TriggerOperationOrBuilder 
    EmailComms.EmailBatch
    Specifies the structure of a batch of email transmission operations.
    EmailComms.EmailBatch.Builder
    Specifies the structure of a batch of email transmission operations.
    EmailComms.EmailBatchOrBuilder 
    EmailComms.EmailContent
    Specifies email content for a given ad group.
    EmailComms.EmailContent.Builder

    EmailComms.EmailContentOrBuilder

    EmailComms.EmailMessage.Builder

    EmailComms.EmailMessageOrBuilder 
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata
    Specifies schema-based metadata appended to a message.
    EmailComms.EmailMetadata.Builder
    Specifies schema-based metadata appended to a message.
